item.description:
Sorry for the short notice but just found the notification for this sale in my inbox. Treat someone you know (or yourself for that matter) to some new-to-you clothing, gear, and equipment at a reasonable price.

The sale starts at 10:00 AM but admittance will be determined by numbered tickets which will be handed out on a first-come, first-served basis beginning at 8:30 AM. If you show up at 10:00 AM without a ticket you will likely miss out on the best deals.

REI Boston is overflowing with great winter gear deals, so we have scheduled a Special Members-Only Used Gear Sale (Formerly the Garage Sale) for Saturday, December 8th. Checkout tons of imperfect merchandise. Prices are slashed 30-60% but firm.

If you are wondering what clothing, gear, and equipment you might need for winter hiking check out our list of stuff for winter day hikes by clicking here.

An REI membership is required to purchase. Not a member yet? A lifetime membership is only $20 and can be purchased on the day of the sale! Don't miss out on the Incredible Bargains! ALL SALES ARE FINAL- NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES.

Can't make it to REI Boston on the 8th? Be sure to check out our marketwide (ALL Mass area REI locations) Year-end Used Gear Sale on Saturday, December 29th.
item.name: Used Gear Sale - REI Boston ONLY
